Title: Where He Leads Me
Plot: Rayna needs to take a look at what?s really important to her after hearing Teddy?s side of the story about Peggy; Juliette feels a sense of belonging with Sean?s family that she has never experienced before; Gunnar risks his partnership with Scarlett when he confesses his feelings; and music producer Dominic Wells invites Avery to Atlanta to work together while Deacon gets an amazing offer to tour -- but both opportunities come with a price.
GuestStars: Judith Hoag, Michiel Huisman, Rya Kihlstedt, Wyclef Jean, Chloe Bennet, Nicholas Strong, Tilky Jones, Daniel Buran, Kimberly Williams-Paisley
